text: Michael Anthony Peña (born January 13, 1976) is an American movie, television actor and musician. He is best known for his roles in movies such as Crash, World Trade Center, Shooter, Observe and Report, 30 Minutes or Less, Tower Heist, End of Watch and A Wrinkle in Time. Peña was born on January 13, 1976 in Chicago, Illinois.Michael Peña Biography (1976-) He grew up in the Chicago areas of North Lawndale and in Chicago Lawn. He is married to Brie Shaffer. They have a son, Roman. Peña is a Scientologist. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Scientologists
title: Michael Peña
